readme:
# atom-polaris package

Polaris is Shopify's design system and serves as a guideline for their front-end development. The design system includes a suite of React components that you can use easily use in any application. This package provides snippets for the components and additionally gives documentation for each component.

![Screenshot 1](http://i.imgur.com/75k7FrX.gif)
![Screenshot 2](http://i.imgur.com/HXt6k1L.gif)
